entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow mixed with ice pellets and risk of freezing rain. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow mixed with ice pellets. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow mixed with ice pellets ending in the morning then cloudy. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 05 January 2023
